content:
The Ukrainian cyberwar has attacked a number of Russian government and local portals, including the Troika Pay system.

About thisreportedIn the Ministor.

It is one of the largest ticket payment systems in Russia, which serves 38 regions.

Therefore, because of the "failure", the owners of transport cards in Moscow and Kazan could not pay the tickets, replenish the fare and pay for parking.

As reported by the Armyinform, IT Army of UkraineattackedThe largest online portal in Russia MAIL.GU.
title: The IT army has suspended the operation of the Moscow metro
description: This was reported in the Mincrifra. This is one of the largest ticket payment systems in Russia, which ...
author: Army Inform
